thread.title: Mum who lost 11st now has the perfect bikini body… after her husband paid for £7k op to remove sagging ‘granny skin’ that hung lower than her genitals
thread.title_full: Mum who lost 11st now has the perfect bikini body… after her husband paid for £7k op to remove sagging ‘granny skin’ that hung lower than her genitals

author: nkeegan
title: Mum who lost 11st now has the perfect bikini body… after her husband paid for £7k op to remove sagging ‘granny skin’ that hung lower than her genitals
text:
Mrs Crunch ‘It was like a hanging blob of mess’ Mum who lost 11st now has the perfect bikini body… after her husband paid for £7k op to remove sagging ‘granny skin’ that hung lower than her genitals 
Donna Clayton, 33, from St Joseph, Missouri, USA, ballooned to nearly 18st 8lbs after years of consuming large portions of carb-laden meals By NATALIE KEEGAN
